extension_description.message: Find email addresses from anywhere on the web, with just one click.

are_you_statisfied.message: Are you satisfied with Hunter extension?

please_let_review.message: Please help us spread the word by letting a review!

we_are_sorry.message: We are sorry to hear this.

please_contact_us_for_feedback.message: Please contact us at contact@hunter.io if you want to give us feedback or ask any question. We would be happy to help.

please_connect_account.message: Please connect your Hunter account to use the extension. It's free.

not_enough_data_for.message: There is not enough data available online for

domain_used_for_personal_emails.message: This domain is used to create personal email addresses. These email addresses are not returned in Hunter which is designed for professional use only.

we_could_not_find_with_filters.message: We couldn't find any results matching your criterias. Update or clear your filters.

could_not_find_email_for_person.message: We couldn't find the email address for this person.

not_available_on_linkedin.message: Hunter is no longer available on LinkedIn

find_emails_with_email_finder.message: To find the email address of people you have identified, please use the Email Finder.

open_hunter_on_websites.message: Open Hunter when you visit websites to find email addresses.

connection_refused.message: The connection to Hunter has been refused

visit_website_for_information.message: Please visit the website for more information.

something_went_wrong_with_the_query.message: Sorry, something went wrong with the query.

sign_up_to_uncover_more_emails.message: Please sign up to uncover the email addresses

email_verification_takes_longer.message: The email verification is taking longer than expected. Please try again later.

enter_full_name_to_find_email.message: Please enter the full name of the person to find the email address.

we_found_this_email_on_the_web.message: We found this email address $COUNT$ time$S$ on the web.

something_went_wrong_on_our_side.message: Something went wrong on our side. Please try again later.

please_complete_your_registration.message: Please complete your registration on the website to use the extension.

your_account_has_been_restricted.message: Your account has been restricted. Please log in for more information.

you_have_reached_your_daily_quota.message: You have reached your free monthly quota. Please upgrade to a premium plan to do more searches.

you_have_reached_your_temporary_quota.message: You have reached your temporary quota. You will get your full access as soon as we validate your account.

your_have_reached_your_monthly_quota.message: You have reached your monthly quota. Please upgrade to do more searches.

your_have_reached_your_monthly_enterpris.message: You have reached your monthly quota. Please contact your account manager to update your plan.
